title: Ticket #6745: Fix voms when using libressl
description: When moving to use LibreSSL on the latest version of macOS (10.13), we left the voms library with an unresolved reference to ASN1_sign(). This function is present in OpenSSL, but was removed from LibreSSL. This was ok for normal HTCondor binaries, as they never use voms in a way that would call that function. But we get a runtime error about the unresolved symbol in the python bindings.
remarks:
2018-Aug-23 16:34:08 by jfrey:
Since we build our releases on older versions of macOS, which don't have LibreSSL, this change doesn't merit a version history entry.
check_ins: 2018-Aug-23 12:52   Check-in [55334]: Don't call ASN1_sign() in voms when using LibreSSL. #6745 LibreSSL removed the ASN1_sign() function of OpenSSL. Provide a local version of ASN1_sign() in voms when using LibreSSL. (By Jaime Frey )
